title: Athletism — Climbing (Elite) — Phase 9: Sharpening & Taper
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Weighted vest, sandbags, farmer carry handles
Rock shoes, approach shoes, helmet, rope (as needed)
goal: Reduce volume 40–50%, keep intensity touch; protect fingers.

warmup: Activation 8' (scap control, deep core, glute med)
Easy traverse or banded forearm prep 5'

notes: Week 1: −30–35% volume; Week 2: −45–55%; no DOMS work.
